data.persona: I am a priest. I attend to the salvation of my flock. I have few possessions. I trust in the will and goodness of god to see me through adversity.
data.description:
You are in the Visitor's Entrance.
The visitor's entrance features a large wooden double door. The door is beginning to shown signs of aging as splinters poke out of it's surface, but it's size and mass still cast awe onto oncoming visitors. In a cast iron display on each side of the door one can see the Goddess' insignia. The door is reinforced horizontally with an iron lock.
The donkey and the clergy are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to check if the scroll is the forbidden text I suspect it is
data.mid_motivation: I want to detain the clergy and question them about how they got the scroll
data.long_motivation: I hope to expose a conspiracy I believe has been brewing in the church
